Publication Title: Mathematical Modeling Identifies Optimum Palbociclib-fulvestrant Dose Administration Schedules for the Treatment of Patients with Estrogen Receptor-positive Breast Cancer
Publication Authors: Yu-Chen Cheng, Shayna Stein, Agostina Nardone, Weihan Liu, Wen Ma, Gabriella Cohen, Cristina Guarducci, Thomas O McDonald, Rinath Jeselsohn, Franziska Michor
Publication Abstract: Cyclin-dependent kinases 4/6 (CDK4/6) inhibitors such as palbociclib are approved for the treatment of metastatic estrogen receptor-positive (ER+) breast cancer in combination with endocrine therapies and significantly improve outcomes in patients with this disease.
